member.name: M:AnalysisManagerICR2LSPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerICR.FixICR2LSResultFileNames(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Look for the .PEK and .PAR files in the specified folder Make sure they are named Dataset_m_dd_yyyy.PAR and Dataset_m_dd_yyyy.Pek

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerICR2LSPlugIn.clsAnalysisResourcesIcr2ls.FindSerFileOrFolder(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Looks for a ser file, fid file, or 0.ser folder in strFolderToCheck
member.returns: The path to the ser file, fid file, or 0.ser folder, if found. An empty string if not found

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerICR2LSPlugIn.clsAnalysisResourcesIcr2ls.RetrieveExistingTempPEKFile
member.summary: Look for file .pek.tmp in the transfer folder Retrieves the file if it is found
member.returns: CLOSEOUT_SUCCESS if an existing file was found and copied, CLOSEOUT_FILE_NOT_FOUND if an existing file was not found, and CLOSEOUT_FAILURE if an error
member.remarks: Does not validate that the ICR-2LS param file matches (in contrast, clsAnalysisResourcesSeq.vb does valid the param file). This is done on purpose to allow us to update the param file mid job. Scans already deisotoped will have used one parameter file; scans processed from this point forward will use a different one; this is OK and allows us to adjust the settings mid-job. To prevent this behavior, delete the .pek.tmp file from the transfer folder

member.name: T:AnalysisManagerICR2LSPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerLTQ_FTPek
member.summary: Performs PEK analysis using ICR-2LS on LTQ-FT MS data
